2a1(nyi khri): su ma chog/ sa so// zhes dang mi spyod/ shes rang kyi
2a2(nyi khri): rol tu bya da pa la spyod de// tshe rang dang / 'du shes
2a3(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rna par shes pa yongs su ma rdzog sa so zhes
2b1(nyi khri): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi dra la tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
2b2(nyi khri): skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su ma
2b3(nyi khri): rjegs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin
2b4(nyi khri): pa la spyod de// pha la tu phyin pa thams cad dang / spe pa nyid thams
2b5(nyi khri): cad yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyad na// sa rab kyi pha rol tu
3a1(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so
3a2(nyi khri): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / 
3a3(nyi khri): khru rtso pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang rub kye
3a4(nyi khri): yang lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes
3a5(nyi khri): bar mi skyed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dngo // 
3b1(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / 
3b2(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / 
3b3(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su mA rdzogs so zhes bya
3b4(nyi khri): bar mi skyed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ti nge 'dzin rnams dang / 
3b5(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yong sa su ma rdzog so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
3b6(nyi khri): bal spyod de// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
4a1(nyi khri): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / 
4a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya ba mi spyod no/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
4a3(nyi khri): do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
4a4(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no
4a5(nyi khri): zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
4a6(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang
4a7(nyi khri): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su ma
4b1(nyi khri): rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// zhes de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
4b2(nyi khri): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang / ma chag
4b3(nyi khri): pa legs par bstan pa 'di ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
4b4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang / mtsha gas pa legs par bstan to// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
4b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs chags pal ma/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
4b6(nyi khri): pal spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te skye mche
4b7(nyi khri): dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa/ 
4b8(nyi khri): ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
5a1(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
5a2(nyi khri): spyong ngo // nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du chags
5a3(nyi khri): pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 
5a4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang tshang med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
5a5(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang // stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
5a6(nyi khri): med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am me chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang
5a7(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs
5a8(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad chags pa'am/ ma
5b1(nyi khri): chags pa zhes bya bar ma srung na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ 
5b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na gzugs chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya
5b3(nyi khri): bar 'du shes pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// skye
5b4(nyi khri): mcheng dang / khams dang rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong panying thangs
5b5(nyi khri): cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun chag/ sa pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// baphags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / sa
5b6(nyi khri): gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang
5b7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa bsam chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi
5b8(nyi khri): ma chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa mang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa shing / 
6a1(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rgyun tu zhugs
6a2(nyi khri): 'bras bu chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags
6a3(nyi khri): ba zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rang byang chub chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes
6a4(nyi khri): bya bar 'du shes pa med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'a dngas de ltar chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi'i dgrib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'phel/ 
6a5(nyi khri): ma bstan kyang mi 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi/ sa bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// rab 'byor dede bzhin te/ chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ ma
6a6(nyi khri): bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang mi 'phel lo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mtsho'i bar
6a7(nyi khri): du bzhugs shing na mkha'i legs pa'am/ ma legs pa brjod kyang / nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa med do// nyes pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa med do// nam mkha' ni legs
6a8(nyi khri): pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do// nyes pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyu la'i skyes bu ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do// nyes pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do// ra
6b1(nyi khri): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni legs pa brjod kyang yongasu 'grib pa med do// nyes pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do// legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba med do// nyes pa brjod kyang
6b2(nyi khri): khong khro dar 'gyur ba med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de bsduran kyang de bzhin/ ma bstan kyang de bzhin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
6b3(nyi khri): rin po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe/ zhum pa dang / g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson par bgyid cing blan med pa yang
6b4(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o// // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol
6b5(nyi khri): tu byed pa bsgob pa 'dini/ rnamakha' bsgob pa ste/ nam kha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// nam kha' la ni skye ched
6b6(nyi khri): dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma mchis so// na mkha' la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
6b7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// na mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ma mchis
6b8(nyi khri): nang che bar gyu nag pa ma mchis so// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'dag
7a1(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so// na mkha' la ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
7a2(nyi khri): so dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so// na mkha' la ni ting
7a3(nyi khri): nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis so// na mkha' la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byabs pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
7a4(nyi khri): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchis so// namamakha' la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// lan ci gra phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / 
7a5(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub ma mchis so// na mkha' la/ ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis so// // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
7a6(nyi khri): gis go cha 'di 'tshal pa de dag ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di 'chal ba de dag ni na mkha'i don du 'artson par mos 'bod bar mos/ chol gro pa dag sde bcom ldan 'das gang de dag gis sems can
7a7(nyi khri): rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'chal pa de dag ni na mkha' yongs su smin par 'tshal zhing yongasu grol bar 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// namakha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyis
7a8(nyi khri): du go tsho 'tshal ba de dag ni go che chen po 'tshal pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni na mkha' bar snang la 'degs par 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
7b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni brtson 'grus chen po thob pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
7b2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
7b3(nyi khri): gang na mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni dpa' bo bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal pa'o// 
7b4(nyi khri): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dam bu'i dbyings sam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi
7b5(nyi khri): tshal lam/ smig ma'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am brtul
7b6(nyi khri): pa'i lhag par chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re ras sems can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am// gang
7b7(nyi khri): mi gda'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dang na pa'i slad du ste/ de bzhin du gal te phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
7b8(nyi khri): / 'dam bu'i dbyings sam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing tshal lam/ smig ma'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongasu
8a1(nyi khri): gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res/ sems can chad ma mchis grangs ma
8a2(nyi khri): bya tshangs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am/ gang bar mi gda'o// de ci'i slang du ne na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das na/ 
8a3(nyi khri): ngas des na/ bdag 'di skad du sems can rnams kyi srung du/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i drang chub tu mdza ma rang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ rnam pa' yongs su smin par bgyid par 'tshal zhing yongs
8a4(nyi khri): dkrol bar 'tshal ba lags zhes mchi'o// de nas dge slong gcig/ gcig 'di skams du gyur te/ gang la chos gang yang skye bar / 'gug pa yang med la tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/ ti
8a5(nyi khri): 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang yod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/ 
8a6(nyi khri): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyang yod/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa yang yod/ 
8a7(nyi khri): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyang yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yong sa sa dkon dang / chos dkon dang / 
8a8(nyi khri): dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang yod pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshalo snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa nga
8b1(nyi khri): 'byor la 'di skad ces smras// btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na de gang la brtson par byed pa yin/ rab
8b2(nyi khri): 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par sems pa de ni na mkha' stong pa la brtson pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
8b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun nub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung
8b4(nyi khri): ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bsgrub pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/ bcom lda na 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal tu gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces
8b5(nyi khri): smras so// ke'u shi ka khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes sum thong ngam/ smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gi gang la bsrung ba dang / 
8b6(nyi khri): bskyed pa dang / bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rje su ma 'thong ngo // rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
8b7(nyi khri): ras na de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par 'gyur ro// gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bral bar gyur na de la mi 'am/ mi ma yin pas glags tshol ba rnams kyis
8b8(nyi khri): gar ro// gang ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o// ko'u shig byang chub
9a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams la bsrung ba dang / bsrung ba dang / bsgrub par gang sems pa de ni rnamakha' la bsrung ba dang / bsnyung ba dang / bskus
9a2(nyi khri): mar snyoms pa ste/ de'i bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka ji snyapa du sems/ khyod kyis sbru ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / sprul pa la
9a3(nyi khri): bsrung ba dang / bsrung ba dang / bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor do na mi nus so// smras pa ko'u shi ka de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
9a4(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa rnams/ bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bsgrub par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal bcar du 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis de
9a5(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsdu nga ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bsgrub par rus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor don mo nus so// spras pa/ 
9a6(nyi khri): ko'u shig de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dnga' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams/ bsrung ba dang / bsrung ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa
9a7(nyi khri): skal pa can du 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la/ bsrung ba dang / bsrung ba dang / 
9a8(nyi khri): bsgrub par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// smras pa ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams/ bsrung
9b1(nyi khri): ba dang / bsrung ba dang / bsgrub par gang sems pa de ni/ bsapa pa ltar mi 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byid gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 
9b2(nyi khri): btsun pa rab 'byor ji rngam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rmi lam lta bu'i chos dang / snu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / 
9b3(nyi khri): mig yor lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams yongs su shes pa dang / de ltar yongs su shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lapa
9b4(nyi khri): gyis rlob sems su mi byed/ zil ma la rlob sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis
9b5(nyi khri): smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen be shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed do// 
9b6(nyi khri): gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed da/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyi rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pas rlom sa
9b7(nyi khri): 'bang / sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa la rnams sa
9b8(nyi khri): lapa rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyi rlob sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul
10a1(nyi khri): pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// skye ma da dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rlom sems su mi byed/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas rlob sems su mi byed// rten cing 'brel par
10a2(nyi khri): 'byung ba la rlom sems su mi byed// de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom semasu mi
10a3(nyi khri): byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// pha rol tu phyin pa thas cang dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rlom sems su mi byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu cu bdun gyis
10a4(nyi khri): rlom sems su mi byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rlob sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// 
10a5(nyi khri): sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su ma/ byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnam
10a6(nyi khri): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
10a7(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams rlom sems su mi byed mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ 
10a8(nyi khri): rmilam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgornams rlomasams
10b1(nyi khri): su mi byed/ gzus kyi sgo rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mi lam la rlom sem su mi byed do// 
10b2(nyi khri): sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / 
10b3(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang / sring rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rlom sems su mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
10b4(nyi khri): pa rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ darmil ma rlom sems su mi d+h+ye dang / rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom semanas su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul
10b5(nyi khri): pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam
10b6(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ dermi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ 
10b7(nyi khri): stsal pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
10b8(nyi khri): mche ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gnan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / chas lha nye pan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi
11a1(nyi khri): pung gang rnga stong gcig yod pa de dag thams cad/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lpags nas/ bcom
11a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyi nangs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas rgyal ba chen po bani dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byid dang / mi 'dzid kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gnas gcang ma'i ris
11a3(nyi khri): bar gyi lha rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong // yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan nyid 'di mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
11a4(nyi khri): pazab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / den lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ci'i rje 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su 'dri ba sems kyis
11a5(nyi khri): mthong bar gyur to// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang na dang / shar lho dang / sngo nub dang / nub bya dang / 'og / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs ri re zhing // sangs rgyas stong yi ge zhi
11a6(nyi khri): ngag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'ang nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / ngan
11a7(nyi khri): lha'i dbang po btu byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid shu zhing yongs su dri bsems kyis mthong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan parab 'byor la 'od skang ces bdaka' stsal
11a8(nyi khri): to// rab 'byong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byams pa yang sa'i phyogs cing du blang med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
11b1(nyi khri): byin pa 'di med ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro// gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang / sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du dran med pa yang
11b2(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang drub tu bangon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chang par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dang rtags gang dang mtshan pa
11b3(nyi khri): gang gis nga du sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po byings pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang dub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ba sa cing 'ard par 'gyur/ sang
11b4(nyi khri): ces gsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rang 'byor la la di gad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byabs pa/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs
11b5(nyi khri): ba'i drung rub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces byab 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// ga thugs pade zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug sngal zhes bya ba 'am/ jugs
11b6(nyi khri): dadag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ mazhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs
11b7(nyi khri): bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya ba chos stod par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs 'das zhes bya 'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ daltar byung zhes bya ba chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// dor ba dang / 'du shes
11b8(nyi khri): la bang bye dang / rnam par shes pa dag ces bya ba 'amang/ mi rta ga ces bya ba chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ rnam par shes pa pa ga ces bya
12a1(nyi khri): pa'am/ das med ces bya ba'am/ rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos spyod par
12a2(nyi khri): 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 
12a3(nyi khri): skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ rten cing 'brel
12a4(nyi khri): par 'byung ba bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos paston par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel par 'byung bzhi zhes bya ba 'am/ 
12a5(nyi khri): ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sten cing 'brel parar/ byung ba bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol ba zhes bya bar chos ston/ par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'das shes bya ba 'am/ 
12a6(nyi khri): mi 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag
12a7(nyi khri): ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdud pa de zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ma
12a8(nyi khri): ces bya ba'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni zhes bya ba'am/ ma'i
12b1(nyi khri): zhes bya ba ces stod par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu bdun cings zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su ma du bdun 'das zhes bya ba'am/ 
12b2(nyi khri): pa'angs shes bya ba 'am/ ngasang drung zhes bya ba chos spyod par mi 'gyur ro// 'dags pa'i bdin pa rnams dang / bsam gtan nams dang / chad med pa rnams dang / gdugs med pa'i skams par 'jug pa rnams
12b3(nyi khri): dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ 
12b4(nyi khri): mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces
12b5(nyi khri): bya ba 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi gces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams ni zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos stong par mi 'gyura'o// 
12b6(nyi khri): mngo par shes pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos stod par
12b7(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba
12b8(nyi khri): ga'angs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes
13a1(nyi khri): thub pos sna pa ma 'gyuro// gargyas kyis mas sa shes bya ba'am/ thal zhes byab tsas ston pa mi 'gyur ro// gardzas kyi snyornams 'das shes bya ba 'am/ malas shes bya
13a2(nyi khri): 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhi gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams cag
13a3(nyi khri): ces dra ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba chos stod par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ 
13a4(nyi khri): dag la ces bya ba 'am/ sas rgyas kyichos ma 'dres parnams sa ces byaba'ang/ mi sdug ces bya ba chos spyo pa mi 'gyur ro// sas rgyas kyirnam ma 'dres pa rnams mi mas bya ba'am/ ma'im
13a5(nyi khri): bra bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre kha rnams bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos sto par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'das/ 
13a6(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba'am/ nga ltar byung zhes bya bar chos stod par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos stor par mi 'gyur ro// 
13a7(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhing bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdun
13a8(nyi khri): ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings
13b1(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad ma khyed pa nyid 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
13b2(nyi khri): bangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos ni ji ltar ston par 'gyur/ ston ni ci zhig ston par 'gyur/ bcom
13b3(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes
13b4(nyi khri): shin tu dam par dag pa'i ros ston par 'gyur ro// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// pha rol
13b5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi gas kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden
13b6(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong
13b7(nyi khri): zhing dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shi
13b8(nyi khri): ga go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
14a1(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa
14a2(nyi khri): chas ston par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab
14a3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa'o// rab 'byor ste mched dang / khams dang / 
14a4(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa ba
14a5(nyi khri): yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / da med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam
14a6(nyi khri): par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
14a7(nyi khri): phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / 
14a8(nyi khri): so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ 
14b1(nyi khri): shes kri rol tu phyin pa 'ongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs 'angs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa lags/ ji lta na/ tsho ba dang / 'dunas
14b2(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i slad
14b3(nyi khri): du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi
14b4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzug sa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar
14b5(nyi khri): kyis gnas pa'i stobs par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smod pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
14b6(nyi khri): dag pa lags/ ji ltar na/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / pi 'jigs
14b7(nyi khri): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid kyi
14b8(nyi khri): sa dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon
15a1(nyi khri): khengs pa ring ba dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la skyeb med pa dang / 'gag pa red pa dang / kun nas nyon
15a2(nyi khri): mangs pa med pa dang / rnam par drang ba med pa'i rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la skye med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
15a3(nyi khri): dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa
15a4(nyi khri): med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs sud ga pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dpa
15a5(nyi khri): chad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i spobs par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i spobs par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
15a6(nyi khri): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o// ting nge 'dzin
15a7(nyi khri): rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par dbyung ba med pa ni gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
15a8(nyi khri): dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par
15b1(nyi khri): rung bamed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med
15b2(nyi khri): bdi ya la thams cad mkhyen pa cid kyi yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang rnam pa' yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rabakyi la rol tu phyin pa 'angos su ngag pa'o// gsol ba/ bdom ldan 'das ltar na/ nas par
15b3(nyi khri): yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byung ba medang ba
15b4(nyi khri): phyir namakha' yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor namakha' la 'go ma dpa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ nam pa' la 'gob ma pachis
15b5(nyi khri): nga'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam kha'ag zung du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// 
15b6(nyi khri): rab 'byor namanga' la thasrang med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na namakha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
15b7(nyi khri): ga pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam pa' ni sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra ltar namakha' la tha skad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab
15b8(nyi khri): 'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ namakha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
16a1(nyi khri): sudag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dpa pa' la ni gang yang brjod du me // ma byung bzhin dum pa la brjod du med pa'i byor/ shes rab kyi rol tu
16a2(nyi khri): phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang namakha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ na mkha' dmigs su byed pa'i
16a3(nyi khri): slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' la gang yang dmigs su reng ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du dmakha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes
16a4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ongs su dag pa'o// rang 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad skyeb med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun na sa nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes
16a5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ ma ldan 'das ji ltar na/ chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis
16a6(nyi khri): pa dang / rnam par byang ba mar chis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ shes
16a7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa
16a8(nyi khri): ngang tshul bzhin du yid la bcing na/ bcom ldan 'das de la mig gining zung bar mi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i dadang / sna'i ring dang / lce'i na dang / yan lag ma chang bar mi 'gyur ro// lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro// 
16b1(nyi khri): rgas pas 'a'ags pa'i lus su mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyibu'am/ rigs kyi bu ba dad pa de bam spong bsadus byed bar 'gyur ro// de'i snang bzhin du lnga brgya snang mang ba 'drang bar 'gru ba/ rgyal re dpa ni rigs kyi
16b2(nyi khri): dmas dang / gnas gtsang ba'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang spang bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro// gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang / ches brgyad dang / cu
16b3(nyi khri): bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lnga'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe/ bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu zham rigs
16b4(nyi khri): kyi bu mo de'i bsod dmas kyi phung po rab tu mang ba tshang ma mchis pa/ grangs ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa ma mchi sa pa gzhal du ba mchis pa/ dpag tu ma mchis pa/ rab tu 'phel
16b5(nyi khri): bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang ces brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes
16b6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lnga'i 'khor gyi nang du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu modo'i bsod nams mang du 'phel te/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa gzhal du med pa
16b7(nyi khri): dpag tu med pa/ rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir she na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o// rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni 'di yin te/ sems
16b8(nyi khri): ngan dmyal ba las/ yongs su grol bar byed pa'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi dang / lhang dbul po las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o// rgyal rigs che zhing mthe ba'i rigs
17a1(nyi khri): 'byin pa'o// bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// khyim bdag po zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// rgyal chen pani'i rigs kyi lha'i skye ba'i sde mched 'byin pa'o// 'du shes me 'du
17a2(nyi khri): shes med pi skye bached kyi bar gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye ba teng 'byin pa'o// rlur du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byed pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang
17a3(nyi khri): drub 'byin pa'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par stan te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che shing
17a4(nyi khri): mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag che shing mtho ba'i rigs rnams yod do// rgyal chen da bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yong // sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mdze ma dang / 
17a5(nyi khri): dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ldan mas yodado// changs ris dang / mangs lha nye pan dang / ma sa pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang ba dang / chang med
17a6(nyi khri): pasnang ba dang / kun snang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / chad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / chad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 
17a7(nyi khri): gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// namakha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi lha rnam
17a8(nyi khri): yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub yod do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang dub yod do// 
17b1(nyi khri): shes ra kyi la tu phyid pa'adi mad// bsam gtan pan yodang // chad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i spobs par 'jug pa pani yang// byang chub kyi phyogs kyichos sum du bdun yod do// sbyid pa'i pha rol du bye
17b2(nyi khri): pa yod de// dul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid
17b3(nyi khri): yong // bas po meng pa'i dra sa nying stong pa nyid kyi bar du yong do// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bani dang / chad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brjod
17b4(nyi khri): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam pa 'ba'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do// de bzhin
17b5(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sas yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje cha na po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rnam pa
17b6(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do// de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de la bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che shing bcwa
17b7(nyi khri): ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsub dang / mche ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gnan 'phrul dbang
17b8(nyi khri): rangs ris dang / tshangs lngaze phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dag pa dang / 
18a1(nyi khri): tshang me dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung chedang / tshad med pache ba dang / 'bras buche ba dang / min pa dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / gyan pa snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lharnams
18a2(nyi khri): yod do// nas pa' mtha' yas skye ba ched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye ma ched dang / chung zang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes pang 'du shes med min sre mched kyi lha rnams yong // rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod
18a3(nyi khri): do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang / 
18a4(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yong ngo // de bas ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o// pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang yang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas can
18a5(nyi khri): mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su bzung ba 'am/ dor ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ 
18a6(nyi khri): yongs su bzung ba 'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos de med do// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa'irin po che 'di la ni dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ 
18a7(nyi khri): zag pa med pa'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med do// rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rin pa cheni dmigs su med do// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa na po tshal ni tshas
18a8(nyi khri): gang gis kyang 'go ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'go bar gyur pa'i chos de lta bu migs su med do// rab 'byor de'i phyir na/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'go ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'o// rab
18b1(nyi khri): 'thong bal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed la/ de ltar mi rtog cing de ltar mi dmigs te/ de ltar 'phro bar mi byed na/ shes rab kyi
18b2(nyi khri): pha rol du par pa la spyod pa ste/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgob pa'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom
18b3(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas
18b4(nyi khri): kyi zhing du 'gre ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gre'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
18b5(nyi khri): 'dran/ ches gang yang stod pa'am/ rnam par ston pa 'am/ yo ngas su ston pa 'am/ 'dzin par byed pa 'am/ 'byin par byed pa 'am/ sme bar byed pa'am/ 'gag par byed pa'am/ ku nas nyon
18b6(nyi khri): mongs par byed pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar byed pa 'am/ 'grib par byed pa 'am/ 'phel bar byed pa 'am/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung bar byed pa med do// rab 'byor da ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
18b7(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dong ba'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin no// gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi 'ams las 'da' bar byed nga ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs mang pa'i khams las 'a
18b8(nyi khri): bang pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bcod 'grus kyi pha rol
19a1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
19a2(nyi khri): ting stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dod ba ma yin/ byang chub gi phyogs kyi ngos supa du bdun bsgrung ba ma yin/ 'dod ba ma yin/ 'dags pa'i bdon pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / chad me
19a3(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i sdom par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
19a4(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'do rab ma sI/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / 
19a5(nyi khri): mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi/ chos ma 'dres pa rnam bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rgyun tu
19a6(nyi khri): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rang byang chub sgrub pa ma/ 
19a7(nyi khri): yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin no// 
19a8(nyi khri): bam po bzhi 'acug gapa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bam yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams bsgrub pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang / 
19b1(nyi khri): rung / mthung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos cid dang / chos kyi byings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos spyod mang pa de ni/ de bzhin du gnas pa ma yin te/ don bzhin gshegs pas/ mngon paras gargyas so
19b2(nyi khri): mngon par thugs su rung ngo // mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chung nas kyang gsung ngo // ston to// brjod do// 'grel to// rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar mang ngo // yang dag par sto
19b3(nyi khri): to// de nas lnga'i bu stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ lhung lhung ldeg gi sgra pUng sa/ lba rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu ta dang / pun+da ri ka dang / man ngar ba dang / man pa ched po
19b4(nyi khri): 'thor zhing / 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to// kye ma shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas/ lha'i bu stong phrag dum mi skye ba de'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/ 'jam du'i gling du chos kyi 'kho la
19b5(nyi khri): gnyis pa bskor ba mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gan sa brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di na chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis
19b6(nyi khri): bskor ba yang ma yin/ gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang / chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am/ mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom
19b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das de ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom
19b8(nyi khri): gis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
20a1(nyi khri): mad pa'i pha rol tu byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyid pa'i pa rol tu byed pan srid pa'i pharol tu phyi pas snang ngo // dang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis snang / 
20a2(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
20a3(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
20a4(nyi khri): dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshang ring pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i stongs pa 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam pa nga ba da dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i sbyangs par 'jug pa nga // stong pa'i
20a5(nyi khri): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smod pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin/ rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgornams gzungs kyi sgra rnams kyis stong ngo // 
20a6(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sos yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi
20a7(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo // ngang
20a8(nyi khri): bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ngo // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams
20b1(nyi khri): cad ma byed pa cing kyis gang // gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das blang du ba sems dpa' sems da pa chen 'a rloms kyi log byin pa 'a du dzin pad/ 'di ltar shes bgyi pol phyin pa rang bzhin snang ba'o// don ngas
20b2(nyi khri): thams ca kyang chos thams cad kyis stong la byang dub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po mas kyang shes rabakyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i thang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa 'ang
20b3(nyi khri): yang / chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar mchis chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la/ chos gang yang 'khor ba'am/ mi 'khor ba'am/ rab tu 'khor bar bgyid pa ma mchis te/ de dag gi chos gang yang yos
20b4(nyi khri): su mthong ba'am/ yongs su ma mthong ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slangad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ rab tu 'khor bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bung rigs sum
20b5(nyi khri): mchis te/ de'i 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu mngon par ma grub pa 'o// do ci'i slad du zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so// mang na yamachis pa
20b6(nyi khri): ni 'khor bar babyed pa'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so// smon pa ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa lags so// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu
20b7(nyi khri): bsnad pa nga / bsgrugs pa dang / rabatu gong pa dang / gzhag pa dang / rnam par dbyeb dang / rnam par dgrol ba dang / smos pa dang / gsal bar dgyi ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa 'don/ shes ba
20b8(nyi khri): 'i byin pa na pa la ma sus pa'o// gas kyi la dru gan pa yang dus ma brtan/  kyang ma 'gyur// gangs kya ma ban ma ju ngas kyim
21a1(nyi khri): pa'o// gang sum kyang mang dus bgyis pa/ de la ni yongs su byangan las 'da' ba ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la gang su yang sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ma mchis so// shes rab kyi ro/ 
21a2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
21a3(nyi khri): ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam pa' med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mnyam pa nyid kyi pha
21a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par dben
21a5(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ ma ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thub pa mad
21a6(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad darigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol
21a7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nim pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
21a8(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du chub med pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
21b1(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par spyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu
21b2(nyi khri): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
21b3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
21b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bco ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad bzung du med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
21b5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skad cig pa ma mchis pa'i she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro// gsol
21b6(nyi khri): ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro// 
21b7(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'don byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// 
21b8(nyi khri): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i
22a1(nyi khri): khye/  lda sa ga// sa gapa tu dzi 'babal bangs pa'i pa da dag/ tsa ldan pas kyis pa/ 'a stsal pa/  dang/ 
22a2(nyi khri): bdamigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos the
22a3(nyi khri): 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dril ma gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmil ma 'thong ba dmigs su med pa'i
22a4(nyi khri): phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyipa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgra brnyan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan pa dang / sgrar brjod pa dmigs su med
22a5(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ me long gi bzhin dmigs
22a6(nyi khri): su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sIg rgyu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i
22a7(nyi khri): phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ smra ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mngad ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// 
22a8(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dmigs
22b1(nyi khri): su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas con
22b2(nyi khri): mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
22b3(nyi khri): na mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dmigs su ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
22b4(nyi khri): gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'din / spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
22b5(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rlom sems ma mchis pa
22b6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
22b7(nyi khri): 'di ni/ mi g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang / 
22b8(nyi khri): ba bal ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma nor ba yang dag pa nyid du mngon par 'chang brgya bar byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
23a1(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ kun nas ldang bar ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa/ 
23a2(nyi khri): / phya la// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa 'di dozhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med cing dmigs su med pa'i phyin
23a3(nyi khri): ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmigs su meng/ 
23a4(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa le pa/ zhes sdang yod pa ma
23a5(nyi khri): yin pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ na sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin/ gti mug ma mchis pa pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
23a6(nyi khri): shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
23a7(nyi khri): pa/ yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
23a8(nyi khri): stsal pa/ sems can med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rab tu spangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
23b1(nyi khri): sa thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes bkyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir mthar gnyis su mi 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
23b2(nyi khri): mtha' rnam par spong ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ tha ma'i dang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dres
23b3(nyi khri): ba med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rnams pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs
23b4(nyi khri): rgyas kyis las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
23b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su meng pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chad ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyi
23b6(nyi khri): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi chang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ na mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
23b7(nyi khri): lan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
23b8(nyi khri): ba/ chos thams cad 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin/ sdug bsngal gyi b.rol tu phyi pa'o/ bcom ldan
24a1(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad tshol bar spor ba med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
24a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
24a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
24a4(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par grub pa ma dad pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
24a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos dmigs su med pa/ 'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin
24a6(nyi khri): ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
24a7(nyi khri): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol
24a8(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chen po
24b1(nyi khri): stong pazed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen papo stong banyid dmigs su me pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dilta ste/ shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'din/ don pa
24b2(nyi khri): pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
24b3(nyi khri): ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
24b4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
24b5(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs
24b6(nyi khri): su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ thog ma dang mtha' ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
24b7(nyi khri): pha/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin
24b8(nyi khri): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 
25a1(nyi khri): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom
25a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rabasde rol tu phyin pa 'din// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byinang gi chos rigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba/ 
25a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nying stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro// 
25a4(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha ro// tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong
25a5(nyi khri): pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das la di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
25a6(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes ri kyi rol tu phyin pa 'dzin/ rnga ba cang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
25a7(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams ngo ba nyid kyi dben pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu
25a8(nyi khri): byin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
25b1(nyi khri): drang babe bar bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dilta ste/ shes
25b2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ yang dag par spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
25b3(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ 
25b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni// dbang po lnga'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ 
25b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// 
25b6(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs
25b7(nyi khri): su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
25b8(nyi khri): pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid
26a1(nyi khri): kyi rnam pa dang / rnam par dben pa'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtshan ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
26a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ smon pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
26a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon pa med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
26a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'a/ ngas 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mthar gyi gan
26a5(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom lda na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyom sa par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom
26a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa dang / ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom
26a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims ngan pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// 
26a8(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sams dang bzod pa dmigs su med pa'i
26b1(nyi khri): phyir// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa 'dzin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dang rtson 'grus migs su med
26b2(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsam gtan dang / 'khrug pa
26b3(nyi khri): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes rab dang / 
26b4(nyi khri): 'jal ba'i shes rab darigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ stobs bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
26b5(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ nges thams cad thub pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ba
